dovechannel.title: Dove Channel
dovechannel.description: A digital-first network filled with uplifting and enlightening movies and shows the whole family can enjoy together.

146706.title: One Peace at a Time
146706.description: A film about a messed up world and how to fix it. Sprinkled with music, this documentary lyrically weaves a tapestry through 20 countries and is as magical as it is informative.

314509.title: WWJD What Would Jesus Do? the Journey Continues
314509.description: A newcomer helps a community — a troubled teen, an estranged family, a pastor losing faith — rediscover hope and redemption and live as Jesus would.

314510.title: WWJD II: The Woodcarver
314510.description: An aging woodcarver takes a troubled teen under his wing and, in doing so, brings the teen and his family back together and back to God.

318781.title: A Mile in his Shoes
318781.description: A minor league baseball team needs a new pitcher, and a man with Asperger's syndrome could be the one to change their losing streak.

319701.title: 1000 to 1: The Cory Weissman Story
319701.description: The inspiring true story of a high school basketball star who was expected to be a standout college athlete until he suffered a debilitating stroke.

326988.title: Twinkle Toes Lights Up New York
326988.description: Twinkle Toes dreams of an awesome summer break with her friends, but heads to NYC instead when her dad gets the chance to direct a Broadway musical.

334042.title: The Nutcracker Sweet
334042.description: When on Christmas Eve the Silberhaus children are presented with a Nutcracker as an early gift, Marie and Fritz are taken on a series of adventures.

337828.title: Paper Angels
337828.description: The story of a family man whose life is changed by a simple expression of kindness and an abused boy who shows him the true meaning of Christmas.

339389.title: The Ultimate Gift
339389.description: The death of his grandfather catapults trust-fund baby Jason on an improbable journey of self-discovery, making him rethink what he truly values.

341861.title: The Identical
341861.description: Twin brothers, separated at birth, find different paths as one becomes a 50’s rock star and the other struggles with choosing music over priesthood.

341862.title: The Ultimate Life
341862.description: With his prosperous world unraveling, a man discovers his late grandfather's journal and is transported back into his incredible, rags-to-riches life.

372433.title: The Bouquet
372433.description: After a tragic event occurs, two estranged sisters return home for the holidays to help their mother run the family floral business.

372434.title: Letters to God
372434.description: After finding letters written by a boy with cancer addressed to God, a postman searching for meaning finds hope through the boy and his mother.

372437.title: The Ultimate Legacy
372437.description: When his grandmother’s dies, a selfish man must change his ways or lose his inheritance but luckily, he is not alone on his journey to self-discovery.

372441.title: Midnight Stallion
372441.description: A teenager and her parents struggle to keep their family farm, and wonder if a wild stallion in a nearby forest might be the answer to their prayers.

377069.title: Chasing 3000
377069.description: A man recounts the cross-country journey of his 15-year-old self and his disabled younger brother to see baseball player Roberto Clemente's 3,000th hit.

377076.title: Remote Area Medical
377076.description: During the U.S. debate about healthcare reform, the media reporters and news crews and filmmakers failed to put a human face on what it means to not have access to healthcare. Remote Area Medical fills that gap; it is a film about people, not policy. Focusing on a single three-day clinic held in the Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee, Remote Area Medical affords us an insider's perspective on the ebb and flow of the event, from the tense 3:30 a.m. ticket distribution that determines who gets seen to the routine check-ups that take dramatic turns for the worse, to the risky means to which some patients resort for pain relief. We meet a doctor who also drives an 18-wheeler, a denture maker who moonlights as a jeweler, and the organization's founder, Stan Brock, who first imagined Remote Area Medical while living as a cowboy in the Amazon rainforest, hundreds of miles from the nearest doctor. But it is the extraordinary stories of the patients, desperate for medical attention, that create a lasting impression about the state of modern health care in America.

380828.title: Streets of Hope
380828.description: Inspired by a true story. The year is 1993 and street gangs are out of control. People are scared. Santos, is barely surviving on the dangerous streets of the city. Thrown out of his home by an abusive father, Santos is in serious trouble. Reverend Minassian, knows nothing about street life, but feels the need to step out of his comfort zone and help young men desperately trapped in gangs. Santos and Reverend Minassian live in two very different worlds and yet, by the grace of God, their paths collide, greatly changing their lives in the process. This film is about taking risks, overcoming the impossible, and bringing hope to the streets.

403570.title: The Saddle Club: The First Adventure
403570.description: The Saddle Club comes together for the very first time! There are only two rules for this club: first, you have to be totally crazy about horses! And second, you have to look out for your friends ... especially when their overnight camping trip is filled with all kinds of troubles like trying to fit in, dealing with overprotective parents and the worst trouble of all — Veronica's tricks! Saddle up and join Carole, Lisa and Stevie on this horse-filled adventure, where they find the best friendships a girl could hope for!

403571.title: Saddle Club: Friends Forever
403571.description: The arrival of beautiful, mysterious French Junior Champion Dorothée Doutey causes rumors and sparks to fly. Lessons from the junior champ are marred by her deep-seated issues that the Saddle Club attempts to fix. Red and Dorothée start to flourish, with Red becoming her confidant. News from home causes Dorothée to face a difficult decision and could lead to Dorothée leaving Pine Hollow — and Red.

435811.title: Saddle Club: Horse of a Different Color
435811.description: The talented girls at Pine Hollow Stables are over the moon about a prized French show horse, and saddling up for an out-of-the-blue rescue mission.

435812.title: Prayer Never Fails
435812.description: When a high-school basketball coach is fired for praying with a player, he teams up with a not-so-saintly lawyer to take his fight to the courts.

435813.title: Saddle Club: Storm at Pine Hollow
435813.description: Can Lisa rehabilitate an abused horse named Storm, whose beauty masks a violent temper? Succeeding could be the difference between life and death.

435814.title: Little Loopers
435814.description: When a misbehaving golf pro is forced to perform community service, he gets a second chance to get on course, instructing a motley group of teens.

458246.title: Chonda Pierce Presents: Stand Up for Families - Home Is Where the Heart Is
458246.description: Chondra Pierce brings her trademark wit, and favorite family-friendly stand-up acts, together for a good-natured evening of comedy.

458405.title: Jungle Shuffle
458405.description: Deep in the Mexican rainforest, two young coatis fall in love, but when one gets exiled by the king, he must rescue the princess and prove his worth.

458414.title: Confessions of a Prodigal Son
458414.description: In a modern re-telling of the Biblical tale, a rebellious young manwho leaves home learns to confront his life choices and mend what he has broken.

458511.title: Kingdom Under the Sea: Return of the King
458511.description: Splash and his sister Coral are overjoyed the great whale king is returning, until a secret spills out that puts their underwater kingdom in danger.

458522.title: The Book of Genesis
458522.description: A woman in hiding tells the story of humanity in this inspiring Biblical drama exploring the beginning of man's relationship with God.

458524.title: Redwood Highway
458524.description: A frustrated retiree who has not seen the ocean in decades embarks on an 80-mile journey, all on foot, to attend her grandchild’s wedding by the sea

458526.title: Chonda Pierce Presents: Stand Up for Families - Episode 3
458526.description: The Queen of Clean brings together her favorite comedians to talk football, political correctness and the hazards of holy matrimony.

458794.title: The First American
458794.description: A documentary on America’s first President, George Washington, from ideas of self-government and the American Revolution to creating the Constitution.

458798.title: Reggie's Prayer
458798.description: A pro football player, still pining for a Super Bowl ring, retires to coach kids at an inner-city school, where a troubled student needs his help.

458861.title: Just Let Go
458861.description: After a drunk driver kills his wife and children, Chris Williams could be forgiven for wanting revenge. Instead he makes an extraordinary decision.

458864.title: Midway to Heaven
458864.description: A grieving widower stuck in his memories cannot find the will to love again, until his daughter returns from college with a surprise guest and a plan.

458878.title: Fathers
458878.description: Two fathers, taking care of their sons alone because of tragedy and divorce, discover that one of their children is slipping into darkness.

458881.title: Miracle of Marcelino
458881.description: Left on the doorstep of a monastery, Marcelino grows to be a mischievous boy, whose longing for a mother leads to a stunning miracle.

458883.title: The Gift of Love
458883.description: At the start of the 20th century, a wealthy orphan, resigned to an arranged marriage, and an immigrant working to help his poor family fall in love.

459240.title: Disconnect. Reconnect.
459240.description: Mark Van Der Poole, his wife, and two teenagers all understand what being "connected" is all about- Twitter, Facebook, Cell Phones, iPads, GPS - their frantic lives are bound to gadgets too numerous to count! This noisy backdrop turns suddenly into awkward silence when a mysterious glitch brings the entire communications grid to a sudden halt! Sudden withdrawal from gadget-driven addictions force the Van Der Poole family together against their will, to face the best - and worst - in each other as they explore old fashioned fun, family, and faith. In the process, they rediscover the real connectedness they hadn't even realized they had lost.

459251.title: Zoey to the Max
459251.description: When her new foster family’s famous show dog is stolen by a pair of thugs, a teen girl sets off on a cross-country adventure to bring him home.

460483.title: American Mormon
460483.description: In the tradition of interviewing strangers in their elements, two men tour the country to document the hilarious misconceptions of Mormon believers.

460484.title: The Errand of Angels
460484.description: A wide-eyed missionary with cheery hope arrives in Austria to begin her 18-month-long mission for the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

460499.title: Tom Brown's School Days
460499.description: In the 19th Century, a young man is sent to a boarding school for rugby players and comes under attack from a rival who wants him to fail.

460500.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors
460500.description: In this Biblical story, Joseph is sold into slavery by his jealous brothers, but his faith keeps him strong through his whirlwind adventures.

460501.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: The Miracles of Jesus
460501.description: Jesus Christ heals the sick and turns water into wine in this animated film that chronicles his most miraculous acts from the Bible.

460502.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: David and Goliath
460502.description: A fearless sheepherder becomes the greatest underdog of all time when he stands up to a giant named Goliath in this Biblical story.

460504.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Daniel and the Lion's Den
460504.description: Daniel's faith is tested when he's thrown into a lion den after refusing to obey a law against prayer in this family-friendly Biblical tale.

461343.title: Cinderella
461343.description: An enchanting young woman charms the prince at the royal ball, but must flee by midnight, leaving behind one glass slipper in this animated tale.

461346.title: Accidental Activist
461346.description: Based on actual events, Ted Murphy’s reputation, livelihood and friendships are threatened after he signs a petition supporting traditional marriage.

461354.title: Homeless for the Holidays
461354.description: A man who takes all of his good fortune for granted is thrown a career curveball and forced to reevaluate his materialistic lifestyle.

461359.title: Tappy Toes
461359.description: A young penguin unexpectedly finds a pair of tap shoes in an old steamer trunk and soon becomes the only penguin who can tap dance.

461376.title: A Pahappahooey Island Christmas
461376.description: Ali pushes the gang to put on the ultimate holiday show, but when actors mess up lines, and baby Jesus goes missing, they learn a valuable lesson.

461383.title: Happy the Littlest Bunny
461383.description: When his brothers pick on him, the smallest of three bunnies asks his chipmunk pal to help him become the big shot he thinks he wants to be.

461389.title: Christmas Oranges
461389.description: A happy child is sent to a harsh institution for orphans where the headmaster dislikes her, but her hopes for a customary Christmas treat spark magic.

461399.title: King's Heart
461399.description: Three days before the big game, a high-school football player faces a stunning setback that threatens to throw his life off course.

461400.title: Maxwell Saves the Day A/k/a Easter Tale
461400.description: A mild-mannered rabbit is called upon to deliver Easter eggs to children, and make sure they stay out of the jaws of a dastardly goat.

461404.title: Saddle Club: Saving Pine Hollow
461404.description: When Pine Hollow is threatened with foreclosure, the Saddle Club gallop into action to raise the funds to save the farm and horses they love.

461405.title: Noah Motion Comic
461405.description: In a world overcome by wickedness, one faithful man builds an ark to save his family and the earth's animals from an approaching calamity.

461412.title: Samson
461412.description: The strongest man who ever lived is brought down by temptation after he falls for an enchanting Philistine named Delilah in this biblical story.

461433.title: The Legend of Tillamook's Gold
461433.description: A withdrawn teenage girl moves with her family to a sleepy town on the Oregon coast, where she's drawn into a hunt for a legendary treasure.

461437.title: Camelotthe Legend
461437.description: King Arthur and his courageous Knights of the Round Table do battle with an evil spell-caster, determined to snatch away the kingdom.

461463.title: All for Liberty
461463.description: A Swiss-German colonist, living in the British colony of colonial South Carolina, finds his family and community suffering under British injustice.

461476.title: Wings of the Wind
461476.description: The journey of a young girl who is searching for the answer to the age-old question of why bad things happen in a world under God’s control.

461489.title: Thorns
461489.description: Devastated by the blow of some of life's trials, a woman enters a local flower shop hoping to find something that will help fill the void of loss.

461504.title: Ben Hur
461504.description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge in this animated film.

461506.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: The Story of Moses
461506.description: An entertaining, educational installment of the animated biblical series that focuses on the re-telling of the incredible life story of Moses.

461513.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: The Nativity
461513.description: This installment of the beloved, animated biblical series recounts the greatest story ever told, that of Jesus' birth in The Nativity.

461527.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Jonah and the Whale
461527.description: A headstrong boy discovers there's no running away from God when he discovers he's trapped in the belly of a whale in this Biblical story.

461546.title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Samson and Delilah
461546.description: This animated adaptation chronicles the biblical story of powerful Samson and deceptive Delilah who learns the secret of his strength is his hair.

462530.title: The Iron Mask
462530.description: Douglas Fairbanks is at his swashbuckling best in one of the last films of the silent era. As D'Artagnan of the famous Musketeers, his job is to protect the King of France's son.

462545.title: Great Bible Stories
462545.description: Witness a touching depiction of sacred events from the Bible and Jesus' teachings with this engaging collection of six short films.

462550.title: Heidi
462550.description: After charming her reclusive grandfather and falling in love with the beautiful mountain he calls home, plucky orphan Heidi is uprooted and sent away to be a companion for an injured girl in this inspiring animated film based on the classic story.

462553.title: I'm a Fool
462553.description: This made for TV movie based on the "American Short Story Collection"from a Sherwood Anderson story deals with a romantic character study involving insincerity between two race track buffs. Ron Howard plays a young man who goes on the road as a horse trainer. To impress a young lady, he lets her believe he is the son of a very wealthy man.

462608.title: The Sky Is Gray
462608.description: From Ernest J. Gaines, author of "The Autobiography of Miss Jane Pittman", comes a deceptively simple, yet emotionally complex tale of a young boy's discovery of what it's like to be black in Louisiana during the 1940's.

462621.title: Paul's Case
462621.description: Lost in a world of fantasy, young working-class Paul dreams of escaping his dreary existence in turn-of-the-century Pittsburgh. As fate would have it Paul gets his chance by stealing some money and subsequently running off to glamorous New York City.

463504.title: Saddle Club: Horse Crazy
463504.description: Between school, riding, boys, and typical adolescent drama, the girls of the Pine Hollows ranch are never bored. They're in for even more excitement, however, when Skye Ransom, a young teenage heartthrob, comes to the farm to shoot a film. While most of t

463505.title: When I Find the Ocean
463505.description: Longing for the father she lost and having no way to say goodbye, Lily strikes out on her own, beginning a journey of the spirit and of the heart.

463506.title: Walter: Lessons From the World's Oldest People
463506.description: A documentary filmmaker and his fiance go on a journey to meet the oldest people on earth, and learn the secrets to a long and happy life.

463608.title: Magic Gift of the Snowman
463608.description: When Princess Electra’s smile is stolen by the evil Charlatan, Snowden the Snowman pulls two kids into his world for a magical adventure.

464116.title: Davey and Goliath: Snowboard Christmas
464116.description: A magical and action-packed holiday adventure takes place when a young boy and his talking dog take an exciting snowboarding trip.

464178.title: For Such a Time
464178.description: This exciting film is based on the compelling Biblical story of Queen Esther, the young Jewish woman who God raised up to become Queen of Persia, the only one who could save her people from annihilation.

464180.title: Daniel's Lot
464180.description: Daniel thinks his life can't get any worse until a chance meeting with a local pastor convinces him he must be obedient to God's plan for his life.

464184.title: Dying to Be Heard
464184.description: Rachel is an executive climbing the corporate ladder who finds herself in an emotional crisis when she discovers she's pregnant. Having to choose between her blossoming career and an unexpected child, this heart-wrenching film underscores the reality of G

464404.title: An Angel for Christmas
464404.description: It's up to a mysterious peasant girl and her wolf companion to spark the Christmas spirit in the hearts of townsfolk of Ironville again.

466029.title: Life With Jesus
466029.description: Follow Jesus across the desert sands of Egypt as he teaches children of all ages the values of Christianity in this animated short film.

466030.title: Chop Kick Panda
466030.description: A pudgy, idle panda only fantasizes of becoming a Taekwondo master, but when an evil tiger threatens his village, he must put his dream into action.

468344.title: Hero Quest
468344.description: When his village is threatened by hyenas, a courageous boy embarks on a quest to find the legendary wolves that once protected his people.

475333.title: Catholics in the City of Angels
475333.description: A French priest in Los Angeles is the focus of how the San Sebastian Church in West Los Angeles brings together different cultures and experiences.

475339.title: Sky Paintings
475339.description: A soothing film of the vibrant colors of the sky, shown through time-lapse photography with wondrous visions usually hidden from sight.

475340.title: Wonderful Waterways
475340.description: A scenic and relaxing tour of some of the most calming, exotic and romantic bodies of water, from lakes and oceans to waterfalls and rivers.

475341.title: Colors of Nature
475341.description: Take in the amazing colors only found in nature and its many inhabitants, filmed in lush, globally exotic locations for a calming, visual feast.

475342.title: The Majestic Alps
475342.description: Behold the world-famous, central European slopes and alps complimented by snow-capped mountain views, calming streams and flower fields.

475343.title: The World in Bloom
475343.description: Witness nature’s beauty in this delightful presentation of some of the world's most beautiful and colorful flowers in splendid field after field.

475344.title: The Alaskan Frontier
475344.description: See Alaska without leaving home in this remarkable journey of America’s largest state and last frontier, filled with wildlife and icy snowscapes.

475345.title: Mountain Lakes
475345.description: Enjoy the magnificent views and scenery of the most beautiful lakes in the world and their lush surroundings, from Lake Tahoe to Crater Lake.

475347.title: Towering Redwoods
475347.description: Enter the canopy of the redwood forest and lose yourself in the lush landscape near soothing streams or stare at the sky and fluttering leaves.

475348.title: Over the California Coast
475348.description: Take a scenic trip of the northern California coast, with a birds eye view from Big Sur to Salt Point, filmed in lush 4k resolution with a drone.

475349.title: Wings on the Water
475349.description: Fly with nature’s magnificent birds of the Pacific flyway as snow geese, hawks, egrets and cranes travel over misty mountain lakes and ocean shores.

496361.title: Rock Bottom and Back
496361.description: Actor and ex-convict Danny Trejo hosts this chronicle of people, famous and not, who’ve beaten staggering obstacles and now pay it forward for others.

564754.title: Christmas Dress
564754.description: On Christmas Eve, a letter carrier and his son work against the clock and a blizzard to deliver lost gift packages to a struggling family.

564756.title: My Broken Horse Christmas
564756.description: John always looks forward to his annual tradition of searching for the perfect horse with his father. But this year, things don't go as planned.

564759.title: Miracle on Highway 34
564759.description: At a highway truck stop diner, a struggling waitress spends Christmas Eve with a trucker, a salesman and an expectant couple during a snowstorm.

570954.title: No Ordinary Shepherd
570954.description: At Christmastime in ancient Palestine, a shepherd boy, crippled in an accident, muses on the significance of the day and meets a miraculous stranger.

571865.title: Hunter's Creed
571865.description: When Dave loses his wife and, subsequently, his faith, his friends take him hunting to a remote cabin where a dark presence begins to stalk him.

571886.title: I'm in Love With a Church Girl
571886.description: A reformed drug lord, living the high life, is torn between loyalty to his former criminal pals and the straight-arrow gal he has fallen in love with.

579090.title: Boonie Bears: Blast Into the Past
579090.description: The Boonie Bears and their human pal have the adventure of a lifetime when they get stuck 30,000 years in the past with gigantic and hungry animals!

594378.title: Boonie Bears: a Mystical Winter
594378.description: The Bear Brothers and the gang return to the forest to hear the legend of the Spirit of Winter as Pine Tree Mountain falls under a frozen spell.

603551.title: Boonie Bears: The Big Top Secret
603551.description: When Briar is washed away in a flood and ends up in the company of a traveling circus, his brother must embark on a grand journey to bring him home.

612169.title: Hillbilly Blitzkreig
612169.description: A World War II-era comedy featuring comic strip characters Snuffy Smith and Barney Google heading off Nazi spies in the woods of Tennessee.

612495.title: All That I Have
612495.description: The nephews of a retired doctor challenge his competency in court after he donates a significant portion of their inheritance to unseemly recipients.

618313.title: Christmas for Sweeney
618313.description: No good deed goes unpunished for a journalist who finds a cash-stuffed wallet on Christmas Eve and uses it to play Santa to help his poor neighbors.

618314.title: Last of the Clintons
618314.description: A range detective infiltrates an outlaw gang of cattle rustlers to expose their racket but his cover is blown after he’s tasked with a kidnapping.

623821.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
623821.description: A wandering cowboy and drifter attempt to help a young man trying to elope with his sweetheart whose sister needs protection from cattle rustlers.

628263.title: Boonie Bears: The Wild Life
628263.description: Welcome to Wild Land, a thrilling new theme park offering guests the chance to turn into their favorite animal by wearing a gene-altering bracelet.

642462.title: Seaper Powers: In Search of Bleu Jay's Treasure
642462.description: A warmhearted tale of a little girl who discovers magical seagrass on vacation in the Caribbean that gives her the power to talk to ocean life.

674493.title: Dispatched
674493.description: Officer Carl Thomas is revered by his colleagues for fearlessly going after the bad guys. But he also has a dark side. God helps him change his heart.

0300006240.title: Boomer Connection
0300006240.description: A celebration of the achievements of the baby boomer generation through a series of motivational interviews with prominent members of the over-55 set.

03936.title: The Joy of Painting With Bob Ross
03936.description: With his trademark soothing demeanor and delicate brush strokes, mellow artist Bob Ross guides viewers through his creative process.

03395.title: Auction
03395.description: From Roman-era masterpieces to the 1941 Jean Prouve bicycle, stunning treasures go under the hammer at the world's most prestigious auction houses.

03460.title: The Living Bible Collection
03460.description: Witness amazing Bible stories come to life, including the resurrection of Jesus The Christ and many other important events from the Old Testament in this inspiring series.

03350.title: The Little Rascals
03350.description: See Spanky, Buckwheat, Alfalfa, and all the Little Rascals at their best in these classic hilarious, heartwarming episodes.

03394.title: Frankly Faraci
03394.description: With a focus on the good and the inspiring,here are conversations and highlights of real stories of faithful personalities in a talk-show format.

03361.title: Hermie and Friends
03361.description: An adorable caterpillar named Hermie and his bug buddies learn some important lessons about friendship, kindness and the power of God's love.

03359.title: Gigi
03359.description: A sweet little girl, convinced that she's really a princess, learns that she doesn't need a castle and jewels to be special in the eyes of God.

03463.title: The Sugar Creek Gang Series
03463.description: Neighborhood pals work together to solve mysteries in their small community in this charming program based on the YA books by Paul Hutchens.

03360.title: God Came Near
03360.description: A peasant girl and a sleepy carpenter experience the nearness of God in a remarkable moment when they first hear his cries and He approaches.

01625.title: The Hive
01625.description: A colorful animated series for pre-schoolers featuring the Bee family, who live together, just like any other family, in Honeybee Hive.

03399.title: Masterpiece
03399.description: Antiques fanatics separate treasure from trash, using their sleuthing skills to spot the high-priced masterpiece among a lineup of imposters.

02311.title: The Saddle Club
02311.description: Amid the excitement and thrill of the horse world, growing up seems harder than ever; but together, the Saddle Club girls are ready to take on the world. From finding the courage to compete in a major horse show in front of hundreds of people, to surviving that first broken heart, the Saddle Club girls overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles. Stevie, Lisa and Carole struggle to support one another through the inevitable joys and sorrows associated with becoming teenagers.

03894.title: Madeline: Original Series
03894.description: Based on the classic children's books, this award-winning series follows the adventures little redheaded Madeline has with pals and teachers in Paris.

0300009055.title: Boonie Cubs
0300009055.description: Follow the adventures of the Boonie cubs and their friends at Pine Tree Kindergarten, where they learn useful life lessons and have fun along the way.
